title: Crysis, Keygen comes with it, step by step instructions
description:
Crysis

100% Virus and Spyware free.

Please seed for atleast a week after you download it. While downloading, patience is the key.

Performance Tips:

Turn off unneccary programs while running the game that may use up some RAM usage.

Some antivirus's may block some perfomances of Crysis making it lag. Disable if neccasary.


Keygen Failures:

If the Keygen doesn't work for you, make sure you're running it as administrator on vista and not just running it. If a problem still persists, write a comment.

Crysis Systom Requirements:

OS: Windows XP with SP2 or Windows Vista

CPU: Intel P4 2.8GHz or faster (3.2GHZ for Windows Vista) / AMD Athlon 2800+ or faster (3200+ for Windows Vista) / Intel Core 2.0 GHz or faster (2.2GHz for Windows Vista) 

RAM: 1GB or more (1.5GB for Windows Vista)

Hard Drive: 12.0GB or more of free space

Video: DirectX 9.0c/10 compatilble

Sound: DirectX 9.0c compatible

Input: Mouse and Keyboard

Graphics Card: Your graphics card must have 256MB or more memory and one of the following chipsets.

ATI Raedeon 9800 Pro (ATI x800 Pro 256MB for Windows Vista)

Nvidia GeForce 6800 GT 256MB or greater
